product_description: New Collection - Aspekt : Insight With clarity, confidence, and a commitment to innovative design
recyclable_offcuts_description: Product can be used as an RDF for energy & cement production
recycling_process_description: Can be upcycled in to a Sound Insulation product or into RDF
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Since 2014 the company has recycled 940 million discarded single use PET bottles - offsetting tonnes of CO2 emissions
factory_finished_description: Recycled PET Cushion & Acoustic Back Carpet Tiles Cradle to Cradle & Green Manufacturer Certified

manufacturing_locations.component: Refer to EPD or Declare Label

material_locations.material: Refer to EPD or Declare Label

specific_installation_methods: Pressure sensitive adhesive can be applied for easy uplift of product at end of life
other_comments: Carpets Inter are fully aligned and support the Paris Climate Agreement & UNITED NATIONS Sustainability Goals. We are dedicated to achieving Net Carbon Zero at source via manufacturing innovation. Investment in factory produced HUMUS + Onsite Energy Production programs will offset CO2 emissions.
